gwt.g3d.resources.client
Interface ShaderResource

All Superinterfaces:
com.google.gwt.resources.client.ResourcePrototype
public interface ShaderResource
extends com.google.gwt.resources.client.ResourcePrototype

Represents a resource that creates a AbstractShader from a vertex shader and a fragment shader. The source for a ShaderResource has to be a vertex shader followed by a fragment shader.

Author:
hao1300@gmail.com

Method Summary
 AbstractShader createShader(GL2 gl)
          Creates a shader using the declared vertex shader and fragment shader as source.
 java.lang.String getFragmentShaderSource()
          Gets the source code for the fragment shader.
 java.lang.String getVertexShaderSource()
          Gets the source code for the vertex shader.
